item.description:
“Last time was a blast, so let's do it again. I can offer to host monthly meetups in my house in Belmont on weekends.”

Each musician attending, please suggest 3 tunes in advance. This way others will have a chance to look at your tunes in advance and prepare. We will first go through the tunes each one suggests in advance, then do others....

We will start at about 3:30 and end by 7PM.

Also, as of September 2012 Meetup changed their payment - it is now $72 per 6 months for the Jazz Jamming group to continue being on the website. For those coming, please bring $5 towards the payment. I am starting with $5 per person and will adjust the payment per person based on how many people come during the 6 months to cover the payment to Meetup. Thanks very much.
item.name: Let's get together and jam.
